title: Textile
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Ends finished with machine stitches.
dimensions: Warp x Weft (selvage to selvage): 11 x 12.4 cm (4 5/16 x 4 7/8 in.)
description: Length of upholstery fabric with all-over pattern made up of rows of flowering trees connected in alternate alignment to a row with a second type of flowering tree, in shades of green and red super-imposed on a small scale leaf pattern of blue, green, and violet on black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Ends finished with machine stitches.. 1971-56-7.
